# vinit's portfolio

> Vinit Nagar's portfolio showcases his skills as a full stack developer with expertise in web and AI products, emphasizing speed, performance, and innovation.

## Documentation

[WebRTC RTCboard](https://github.com/vinitngr/RTCboard): A real-time collaboration platform built with WebRTC, Node.js, React, Redis, and Socket.io.

[Nodebox](https://github.com/vinitngr/Nodebox): Browser-based playground and hosting platform for client-side applications.

## About

Vinit Nagar is a passionate full stack developer exploring AI/ML, webRTC, and real-time collaboration tools. Skilled in modern stacks like TypeScript, Next.js, and WebRTC.
